titlestmt.titleproper: United Automobile Workers of America, Local 2110: Adjunct and Graduate Student Organizing Records WAG 285

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2011-07-29T18:18-0400

did.unittitle: United Automobile Workers of America, Local 2110: New York University Graduate Student Organizing Records

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
Permission to publish materials must be obtained in writing from the:
Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Elmer Holmes Bobst Library
70 Washington Square South
New York, NY 10012
Phone: (212) 998-2630
Fax: (212) 995-4225
E-mail: peter.filardo@nyu.edu

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: In 2003 and 2004, the UAW assisted graduate students at NYU in organizing and attempting to form a union. The collection contains the relevant NLRB decisions, some articles and flyers, and a large amount of printed electronic correspondence. The collection also contains some videos.
